attributes.action: stop British Forces  paying tax when in a theatre of war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think British forces while in a theatre of war should not pay tax, they already pay in blood. 
     I know money is not everything but it will help boost moral because it would be that little bit extra for them and their families, it is the least the goverment can do after putting them in this situation.
